## Libraries

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data

```{r}
mammal_data <- read_csv(here("data/mammals_and_bioclim_table.csv"))
view(data)
summary(data)
head(data)
str(data)
table(mammal_data$VulpesVulpes)
```

## GLM - Vulpes vulpes

```{r}
glm1 <- glm(VulpesVulpes ~ 1 + bio3 + bio7 + bio11 + bio12,
            data = mammal_data, family = "binomial")
summary(glm1)

```
